participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and down-to-earth, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures of life. He is friendly and straightforward, valuing honesty and loyalty.
participant_1.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i'm an electrician. i only listen to country music.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily has a passion for sharing music and helping others. She is adventurous and loves to connect with people from all walks of life.
participant_2.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
